resources.string:
Next bugfix release (Beta version):
 · Fix: Avoid possible crashes during file operation on Android devices below 4.1
 · Fix: Avoid possible crashes on Android devices below 4.4
 · Fix: Prevent crash when moving a cache freshly loaded through send2cgeo to another list
 · Fix: Prevent crash when logging a trackable on some Xiaomi devices
 · Fix: Correctly display user name containing & on main screen
 
 
 2017.03.19:
 · New: New login page used for gc.com
 · New: Link to project-gc.com challenge checker for mystery caches having challenge in their title
 · New: New waypoint handling to make sure, that no user defined waypoint data is overwritten when refreshing the cache from server
 · Info: Waypoint projection on server defined waypoints no longer possible to avoid conflicts (Use "Duplicate Waypoint" to create a user defined waypoint instead)
 · New: Function to extract waypoints from cache description
 · Fix: Do not store website cookies with Google backup to avoid login problems after version upgrade or reinstallation
 · New: Have a button "Previous selection" in list selection while saving a cache
 · New: Allow long press on "Store" icon to directly save cache to previously selected lists
 · Fix: Locally changed listing coords have been overwritten on refresh
 · New: "Add Waypoint" button on top of the waypoint list
 · Fix: Workaround for faulty devices crashing while editing the personal note
 · New: Sort trackables on logging screen by tracking code (configurable)
 · Fix: Missing ellipsis of long cache names in list
 · Fix: Missing visual separation in gallery
 · Fix: Don't delete logs on refresh error
 · Fix: Crash on some devices when editing or saving personal note
 · Fix: Sometimes wrong geokrety name was shown
 · Fix: Export coordinates to clipboard in non-localized format
